last_episode_to_air.name: The One With All the Money
last_episode_to_air.overview: After a disastrous reaction kills the IPO, Adam and Rebekah fight for their lives at WeWork. Adam risks it all in a last-ditch effort. Series finale.

name: WeCrashed
overview: Inspired by actual events â€” and the love story at the center of it all. WeWork grew from a single coworking space into a global brand worth $47 billion in under a decade. Then, in less than a year, its valuation dropped $40 billion. What happened?

episodes.name: This Is Where It Begins
episodes.overview: Adam Neumann is a young entrepreneur finding his path in the business world when he meets Rebekah, who inspires him to launch a company.

episodes.name: Masha Masha Masha
episodes.overview: Tying the knot after a whirlwind romance, Adam and Rebekah begin their life together as he expands WeWork and she pursues acting.

episodes.name: Summer Camp
episodes.overview: The growing WeWork team gathers on Rebekah's family property. Rebekah grapples with a public relations misstep and bad personal news.
With Adam's fame growing and WeWork on the rise, Rebekah begins to feel sidelined at home and decides to pursue a new friendship.

episodes.name: Hustle Harder
episodes.overview: After a huge investment, WeWork is firmly in the big leaguesâ€”and Adam is ready to take aim at his competition. Rebekah's friendship is strained.

episodes.name: Fortitude
episodes.overview: Chaos at WeWork sends the Neumanns on a retreat to the west coast. Concerns grow about Adamâ€™s leadership. Rebekah finds a new focus.

episodes.name: The Power of We
